response.job_title: Head of Logistics Operations and Projects at Sunshine Bouquet Company, Master Candidate in Supply Chain Management (EAN) and Intelligence and Data Analytics (UNIANDES)
response.summary: My interest in the Financial area was stimulated during my professional activity as a Head of Logistics Operation and Projects, where I had the opportunity to develop skills and acquire knowledge in the field of Program Development. I also consider myself a proactive and versatile person. Moreover, I am able to manage different positions in the work group through working with other people from various cultural backgrounds because I have had the opportunity to interact with multicultural teams during my professional experience. Additionally, I like to use my language skills and improve my communication abilities at different levels
response.skills: Management, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Project Management, Financial Modeling, Data Modeling, Modeling, Discrete Event Simulation, Numerical Simulation, Simulation Modeling, Simulations, Simulink, Scilab, Matlab, Mathematical Modeling, Web Development, Program Development, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Programming, LaTeX

company.name: Sunshine Bouquet Company
company.description:
Sunshine Bouquet Company is a privately held, international company that manufactures and sells fresh-cut flowers through various mass-market channels throughout the United States.  What began as a small, family-run flower shop in central New Jersey grew rapidly during the 1980s and became one of the first companies to embrace the emerging supermarket floral industry.

Sunshine is dedicated to perfecting the process of growing flowers, understanding consumer demands, and designing beautiful arrangements that vibrantly fill a room with happiness.
